mean_cn: adj. 脆的，易碎的，霜冻的，干脆的；  n. 油炸马铃薯片；  v. （使）发脆
mean_en: (of food) (also crispy) pleasantly hard and dry; (of fruit and vegetables) (also crispy) firm and fresh; (of the air or the weather) pleasantly dry and cold
sentence: He likes eating potato chips because they are very crisp.
sentence_trans: 他喜欢吃薯片，因为它们很脆。
